author: marvin
msg: Auto-format Perl code using lucytidy.pl.  This whitespace change is
substantial because autoformatting has not been done since the primary
namespace changed from the lengthy "KinoSearch" to the compact "Lucy".

author: marvin
msg: Add perl/sample/ directory to list of ignores for lucytidy.pl.  This is
necessary because the sample code is copied directly out of POD files, and the
POD has some anti-perltidy tweaks to make it look better (e.g. shorter line
length, whitespace to prevent breakup of sample code blocks).
